name: Naked Story
description:
If lose the match Strip on the street !
Streaking in the city !
This is a unique "Japanese Sugoroku" adventure game.
The basic rules are like the "Japanese Sugoroku" game.
Go ahead to the goal while playing a card game.
Winning a card game will reduce the heroine's [HP].
If [HP] decreases, it will be undressed accordingly.
For details, please refer to the manual or the official website.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[If an error occurs.]
Please install the [Japanese language pack].
[Settings] -> [Time & Language] -> [Region & Language] -> [Add a Language] -> [Japanese]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[This game is not translated into English.]
At the moment, only the basic menu is translated.
I have no budget to translate.
If the evaluation and sales are good, we translate the full text into English.(Voice can not be translated.)
I ask a professional company for translation.
Translation is not a decision.
However, even if you translate the game, there is no additional charge for the game.
If you have purchased the game before translation, you can upgrade it for free, not DLC.
Because it is not translated at the moment, it is a discounted price.
If the translation is done, the selling price will rise.(It does not affect those who have purchased in advance.)
If rejected by Valve, translation is not possible under any circumstances.
If did not sell,If the evaluation is extremely bad,If illegal download is rampant,These cases are also impossible.
Please understand.
If this game goes well, it may be possible to create the next work and to translate the next work.
Thank you for reading.
